meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Conopholis, with fleshy roots used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The squawroots grew in the forest, their fleshy roots hidden beneath the soil.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist collected squawroots to make natural remedies for her patients.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the squawroots for tasty snacks and dug them up playfully.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of healing plants, the squawroots stood out like precious jewels with their fleshy roots.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the squawroots filled the room, promising relief and wellness to all who entered.

meanings.definition: The roots of this plant, traditionally used by Native American women for various medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent1: Generations of Native American women passed down the knowledge of using squawroots for healing.
meanings.sent2: The elders taught the young ones how to harvest and prepare squawroots for medicine.
meanings.sent3: The playful children pretended the squawroots were magic wands, casting imaginary spells in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The squawroots held the wisdom of the earth, offering their medicinal secrets to those who sought them.
meanings.sent5: Under the moonlight, the squawroots seemed to glow with ancient healing energy, whispering tales of the past.
